name: Arkane
description:
Play as a powerful wizard, trapped in a dark world filled with monsters and magic. Fight through waves of enemies as you level up and gain perks. Complete quests and unlock new classes to get closer and closer to the heart of the darkness.

Arkane is a short game I made in ~3-4 months for fun. It's not yet finished, but I might update it occasionally with new content. I have many ideas for it, but none I feel confident enough to tackle yet.
